ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound fresh green beans, cut into 2 inch pieces
freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Toast sesame seeds in a dry pan for 1-2 minutes before adding to the skillet for deeper flavor
Don't trim green beans too early; cut them just before cooking to preserve moisture and nutrients
Cook on medium-high heat uncovered so the liquid reduces and beans get slightly caramelized edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple side dish. Would you like tips on how to get the green beans tender-crisp and evenly coated with the sesame flavor?
